remarks: Archimedean ordered groups with no minimal positive value are abelian.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-May-2018.)
statement:
archiabllem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
archiabllem.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
archiabllem.e $e |- .<_ = ( le ` W ) $.
archiabllem.t $e |- .< = ( lt ` W ) $.
archiabllem.m $e |- .x. = ( .g ` W ) $.
archiabllem.g $e |- ( ph -> W e. oGrp ) $.
archiabllem.a $e |- ( ph -> W e. Archi ) $.
archiabllem2.1 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
archiabllem2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( oppG ` W ) e. oGrp ) $.
archiabllem2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ a e. B /\ .0. .< a ) -> E. b e. B ( .0. .< b /\ b .< a ) ) $.
archiabllem2 $p |- ( ph -> W e. Abel ) $.
$d .+ a b $.
$d .0. a b $.
$d .0. a b $.
$d .< a b $.
$d .< a b $.
$d .<_ a b $.
$d .<_ a b $.
$d B a b $.
$d B a b $.
$d W a b $.
$d W a b $.
$d a b $.
$d a b $.
$d a b $.
$d a b ph $.
